experience: You and Mynor both know Rainer Hoffmueller, Brad Roberts, and 1 other

•Manage timely billing for several different partners and clients requiring different level of detail and compliance requirements, audit of billing hours in a systematic approach. •Oversee in-house collections of past due AR, reconciliation of accounts, billing rates, co-payments  as well as outsourced billings.

• Reduced past due accounts by 60% over 8 years resulting in increased sales for the organization.• Generated month-end reports from SAP using my advanced MS Excel skills identified trends and made recommendations which increased cash flow. • Reviewed bad debt, return analysis, credit balances, trends and risk and suggesting reduction of bad debt reserve which effectively increased reported Net Income.  • Collaborated in several SAP process improvements, updates and customization of Accounts Receivables and Business Intelligence modules.  • Tested SAP process improvements ensuring compliance with company policies.

Held dual role as Senior Credit & Collections Representative and as Supervisor, Credit & Collections • Handled large key accounts such as IBM, ING, and Johnson & Johnson.• Reduced portfolio of past due accounts by 60%.• Administered Sales Tax Certificate Compliance process.

Assisted Credit Manager in the collection of past due AR invoices and followed-up on customer account requests for over 600 accounts. Placed accounts on/off credit hold, processed credit card payments, assisted with resale/exempt certificates and helped with compliance and audits from different states.• Completed credit reviews of new and existing customers including bank accounts balances, trade information and D&B report analysis.• Trusted partner of Customer Support, Finance, Marketing, Production, Sales, Shipping and Legal

Mynor's passion for doing complete work and for optimizing the way it gets done set' him apart from others and sets a "tone at the top" for his team. I've had the pleasure of working with and managing Mynor at Sage for the past 14 years. First observing him operate as a Credit Supervisor and later in his current role of Manager, Credit & Collections. Mynor is an intelligent, committed leader who is passionate about providing the best possible experience to his customers. He is a thoughtful and collaborative critical-thinker, understanding the balance of supporting company revenue objectives while managing risk. His capabilities have expanded well beyond credit into ERP implementations, acquisition integrations and organizational restructuring. He is well-liked and respected by his peers and brings a positive attitude and welcomed sense of humor to the team. Mynor would be an asset to any organization and comes with my highest recommendation.
